name: faded women 2
description: I try to find the right texture to portray the passage of time and memory. This is the direction my work usually takes. In this case, the "Faded Women" collection speaks of those loves, of those important people who passed through our lives, who left a mark and now only exist in our memory. I work digital painting on photography to try to capture the dreamlike sensation that the memory transmits in our life without forgetting the raw material of the real world.
